<link href="../css/print.css" media="print" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
<script language="javascript" src="/NSCWebFront/modules/js/jquery-1.8.2.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script language="javascript" src="/NSCWebFront/modules/common/jqueryCommon/js/jquery-ui-1.10.3.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<link href="/NSCWebFront/modules/common/jqueryCommon/ui/themes/base/jquery-ui.min.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
<script type="text/javascript">
	$(function() {
		$( document ).tooltip();
	});
	
	function doPage(page, pageSize) {
		$("#currentPage").val(page);
		$("#pageSize").val(pageSize);
		changePage();//需自行定義
	}
	
	function changePage() {
		$("#form1").submit();
	}
	
	function doSearch() {
		var nameChi = $("#nameChi").val();
		var sex = $("#sex").val();
		var organ_1 = $("input[name=organ_1]:checked").val();
		var organ_2_1 = $("#organ_2_1").val();
		var organ_2_2 = $("#organ_2_2").val();
		var organ_2_3 = $("#organ_2_3").val();
		var organ_2_4 = $("#organ_2_4").val();
		var organDesc = $("#organDesc").val();
		var spec_1 = $("#spec_1").val();
		var spec_2 = $("#spec_2").val();
		var spec_3 = $("#spec_3").val();
		var spec_4 = $("#spec_4").val();
		if( 
			""==nameChi && 
			""==sex && 
			(""==organ_1 || null==organ_1) &&
			(""==spec_1 || null==spec_1) &&
			(""==spec_2 || null==spec_2) &&
			(""==spec_3 || null==spec_3) &&
			(""==spec_4 || null==spec_4) 
			){
			alert("請輸入查詢條件");
		}else{
			if(organ_1 == "1" && organ_2_1 == "") {
				alert('請選擇公立大專院校');
			} else if(organ_1 == "2" && organ_2_2 == "") {
				alert('請選擇私立大專院校');
			} else if(organ_1 == "3" && organ_2_3 == "") {
				alert('請選擇其它公民營機構');
			} else if(organ_1 == "4" && organ_2_4 == "") {
				alert('請選擇學術團體');
			} else if(organ_1 == "5" && organDesc == "") {
				alert('請輸入其他');
			} else {
				$("#currentPage").val("");
	        	$("#pageSize").val("");
	        	$("#sortCondition").val("");
				$("#form1").submit();
			}
		}
	}

	function doClear() {
		$("#nameChi").val("");
		$("#sex").val("");
		$("#organ_2_1").val("");
		$("#organ_3_1").empty();
		document.getElementById("organ_3_1").options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
		$("#organ_2_2").val("");
		$("#organ_3_2").empty();
		document.getElementById("organ_3_2").options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
		$("#organ_2_3").val("");
		$("#organ_3_3").empty();
		document.getElementById("organ_3_3").options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
		$("#organ_2_4").val("");
		$("input[name=organ_1]").prop("checked", false);
		$("#organDesc").val("");
		$("#spec_1").val("");
		$("#spec_2").empty();
		$("#spec_3").empty();
		$("#spec_4").empty();
	}
	
	//不讓enter送出空白查詢
	$(function() {
		$("#nameChi").keydown(function(e) {
			if(e.keyCode == 13) { // enter key was pressed
				var nameChi = $("#nameChi").val();
		  		if(""==nameChi){
		  			return false;
		  		}else{
		  			doSearch();
		  		}
		  	}
		});
	});
	
	function doEdit( accountCollegeId ) {
		$("#accountCollegeId").val( accountCollegeId );
		$("#form2").submit();
	}
	
	//機關單位-擴充
	function changeOrganLB( type, sourceID, targetID ) {
		var organDetailCode, organDetailName;
		var organCodeValue = $(sourceID).val();
		var targetElementID = targetID.substring(1);
		//清空選項
		$(targetID).empty();
		if('' != organCodeValue) {
			var i = 1;//選項index
			$.ajax({
		        type: "POST",
		        url: "/NSCWebFront/modules/NSCC301/OrganDetailServlet",
		        dataType: "xml",
		        data: {
		            organCode:organCodeValue
		        },
		        success: function(response) {
		        	var organSelect = document.getElementById(targetElementID);
		        	organSelect.options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
		            $('organDetail', response).each(function(){
		                organDetailCode = $('code', this).text();
		                
		                	
                    		organDetailName = $('chiName', this).text();
		                
		                if(organDetailName != '') {
		                	organSelect.options[i] = new Option(organDetailName, organDetailCode);
			                i++;
			            }
		            })
		        },
		        error: function(xhr) {
		            var errMsg = '取得服務機關及系所發生錯誤';
		            alert(errMsg);
		        }
		    });
		} else {
			document.getElementById(targetElementID).options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
		}
		changeOrgan(type);
	}

	function changeOrgan(type) {
	    $('input[name=organ_1]:checked').attr('checked', false);
	    $('input[name=organ_1]').eq(parseInt(type) - 1).attr('checked', true);
	}

	//專題計畫類別 GLC32
	function changeKind(planKind1) {
		var planDetailCode, planDetailName;
		// 清除
		$('#kind_2').empty();
		$('#kind_2').val(planKind1);//設值
		if(planKind1 != '') {
			var i = 1;//選項index
			$.ajax({
				type: "POST",
				url: "/NSCWebFront/modules/NSCC301/NSCPlanKindServlet",
				dataType: "xml",
	            data: {
	                planKind1:planKind1,
	                method: 'child'
	            },
	            success: function(response) {
	            	var planKindSelect = document.getElementById('kind_2');//專題計畫類別選單
	            	planKindSelect.options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
	                $('planKindData', response).each(function(){
	                	planDetailCode = $('code', this).text();
	                    
	                    	
	                    	planDetailName = $('chiName', this).text();
	                    
	                    if(planDetailName != '') {
	                    	planKindSelect.options[i] = new Option(planDetailName, $.trim(planDetailCode));//加選項
		                    i++;
		                }
	                })
		        },
	            error: function(xhr) {
	                var errMsg = '取得專題計畫類別發生錯誤';
	                alert(errMsg);
	            }
			});
		} else {
	        $('#kind_2').empty();
	    }
	}
	
	//學術專長 GLC03A
	function changeSpec(type, specCode){
	    var specDetailCode, specDetailName;
	    // 清除
	    for(var i = type; i <= 4; i ++){
	    	$('#spec_' + i).empty();
	    }
	    $('#spec_' + i).val(specCode);//設值
	    if(specCode != '') {
	    	var j = 1;//選項index
	        $.ajax({
	            type: "POST",
	            url: "/NSCWebFront/modules/NSCC301/NSCSpecServlet",
	            dataType: "xml",
	            data: {
	                specCode:specCode,
	                method: 'child'
	            },
	            success: function(response) {
	                var specSelect = document.getElementById('spec_' + type);//學術專長選單
	                specSelect.options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
	                $('specData', response).each(function(){
	                    specDetailCode = $('code', this).text();
	                    
	                    	
	                    	specDetailName = $('chiName', this).text();
	                    
	                    if(specDetailName != '') {
	                    	specSelect.options[j] = new Option(specDetailName, $.trim(specDetailCode));//加選項
		                    j++;
		                }
	                })
	            },
	            error: function(xhr) {
	                var errMsg = '取得學術專長發生錯誤';
	                alert(errMsg);
	            }
	        });
	    } else {
	        $('#spec_' + type).empty();
	    }
	}

	//學門代碼 GLC03
	function changeCode(type, specCode){
		var specDetailCode, specDetailName;
	    // 清除
	    for(var i = type; i <= 4; i ++){
	    	$('#code_' + i).empty();
	    }
	    $('#code_' + i).val(specCode);//設值
	    if(specCode != '') {
	    	var j = 1;//選項index
	        $.ajax({
	            type: "POST",
	            url: "/NSCWebFront/modules/NSCC301/NSCSpecCodeServlet",
	            dataType: "xml",
	            data: {
	                specCode:specCode,
	                method: 'child',
	                level: type
	            },
	            success: function(response) {
	                var specSelect = document.getElementById('code_' + type);//學門代碼選單
	                specSelect.options[0] = new Option('---請選擇---', '');
	                $('specData', response).each(function(){
	                    specDetailCode = $('code', this).text();
	                    
	                    	
	                    	specDetailName = $('chiName', this).text();
	                    
	                    if(specDetailName != '') {
	                    	specSelect.options[j] = new Option(specDetailName, $.trim(specDetailCode));//加選項
		                    j++;
		                }
	                })
	            },
	            error: function(xhr) {
	                var errMsg = '取得學門代碼發生錯誤';
	                alert(errMsg);
	            }
	        });
	    } else {
	        $('#code_' + type).empty();
	    }
	}
</script>
